item.title: CVE-2024-24833|2024-05-08T13:28:22.329Z -- leevio -- happy%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Leevio Happy Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Happy Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 3.10.1.
